title: Vote for the launch of LINA token in the Innovation Zone of ForTube BSC
body:
As a new DeFi product facing the future, ForTube has officially launched a fully upgraded version of ForTube V3. Through asset rating and fund pooling, ForTube V3 has completed the risk isolation of the fund pool in the innovation zones and the stable zones, which avoid the risk of financial contagion to the greatest extent, while alleviating the impact of the failure of the pledged asset system and market fluctuations.
 
In order to introduce more high-quality assets to the ForTube ecosystem, and provide higher revenue and more flexible value capture opportunities, ForTube will cooperate with more excellent DeFi project and communities.
 
ForTube plans to launch LINA in the innovation zone of ForTube BSC. At present, ForTube and Linear have completed the preliminary communication for the launch details. The key parameters are as follows:
 
Token: LINA
Network: BSC
Zone: Innovation Zone
Pledge Rate: 60%
Liquidation Line: 70%
Liquidation Reward: 12%
Deposit Limit: 20M
Borrow Limit: No Limit
 
If the vote is approved, ForTube will carry out merged mining activities, the specific parameters are as follows:
 
Deposit LINA to Earn FOR
Mining Supply Amount: 350,000 FOR
Mining Cycle: 14 days
 
Deposit FOR to Earn LINA
Mining Supply Amount: 653,594 ARPA
Mining Cycle: 30 days
 
Now, we will submit this proposal to the ForTube community, and users can vote through Snapshot.
A. Agree to launch LINA in the ForTube Innovation Zone
B. Disagree to launch LINA in the ForTube Innovation Zone
 
关于ForTube BSC版本创新区上线LINA 代币的提案投票
作为面向未来的全新DeFi产品，ForTube推出了全面升级的ForTube V3版本。通过资产评级和资金分池，ForTube V3完成了创新区和稳健区资金池的风险隔离，最大程度的规避了金融传染的风险，缓解了质押资产系统失灵及市场波动的影响。
为了将更多优质资产引入ForTube生态，为ForTube用户提供更高收益，更加灵活的价值捕获机会，
ForTube将与更多优秀的DeFi项目和社区进行合作。
 
ForTube建议LINA 项目上线BSC版创新区。目前，双方已经完成了上线的审慎沟通，关键参数如下：
 
币种：LINA
网络：BSC
分区：创新区
质押率：60%
清算线：70%
清算奖励：12%
存币上限：2000万个
借币上限：不限
 
如果投票通过，ForTube将开展联合挖矿活动，具体参数如下：
 
【存LINA 挖FOR】
挖矿供应数量:350,000FOR
挖矿周期:14天
                                                 
【存FOR挖LINA 】
挖矿供应数量: 653,594个LINA
挖矿周期：30天
 
 
现在将本提案提交ForTube社区，用户可通过Snapshot进行投票。
 
A：同意LINA 上架ForTube创新区
B：反对LINA 上架ForTube创新区
 
 
投票时间：2021年4月12日18:00—4月13日6:00
author: 0xd49524f9FDC4EA8ba65345253C2B9FdE3b6FAF3A
